blurb: Cytokine Storms: How Immune Resistance Can Turn Deadly.
description: The word “storm” might make you think of thunder and lightening, or maybe floods, tornadoes and hurricanes.  These storms can cause a lot of damage and led to 2,143 injuries and 522 deaths in 2015.  However, there is another kind of storm, a much deadlier storm, that in past, killed more people than WWII.  This deadly storm is called a cytokine storm.
title: Cytokines: Deadly Storms of the Immune System
